text:
Ijan and Zack (mechanic) were really friendly and accommodating when I went for their 1 hour trial session. They gave great, insightful tips about basic kart fundamentals and what to look out for when out on the track.
They also recorded videos of me on track, giving advice on the line choices and braking markers, which were really useful and definitely cut down my time because of that! Will definitely come back to you guys again üôèüèª

Saw the advertisement on Instagram for the Trial Package, and its was a blast for me! Although weather conditions was not the best, Coach Ijan made the best out of it and managed to teach me a lot during the session. Mechanic Zach was also of great help to ensure the kart was ready before heading out. Thanks for making the session an enjoyable one!

We had a really good first trial experience with GTracing and it‚Äôs safe to say we will be coming back! Ijaan is so attentive and he has a way to guiding children on the track. My 10 year old son enjoyed his time on the track so much and made 30 seconds improvement of track time within one trial! It‚Äôs amazing. The karts are also in good conditions and well maintained. Thank you Ijaan and team for the passion and commitment you portray in this sport! :)

Exceptional experience at GT Racing today, I had an absolute blast. Thank you very much to Coach Ijan and Mechanic Zack for making this incredible experience possible. Would recommend them to anyone who wants to try out REAL KARTING.

GT Racing Singapore is hands down the best go-karting experience I've ever had in Singapore! The track and the race karts were thrilling, and the amazing team made the whole session even more enjoyable. Exceptional value for money, and I'm already looking forward to becoming a regular. Highly recommended for a fun day out! üèÅüåü
